IndexPage.ctaSubtitle: Optimize desk usage effortlessly for enhanced workplace productivity and collaboration.
IndexPage.ctaActionAnnotation: Invite your team and get started
IndexPage.ctaSubtitle2: Free trial available; no credit card required
IndexPage.whyWorkplacifyDescription: The first open-source, self-hostable desk scheduling platform. Helping your employees to get their favorite desk and optimize your office spending with advanced analytics.
IndexPage.deskSchedulingDescription: Ever had too many people in the office? We got you covered.
IndexPage.officeManagementDescription: Manage multiple offices, with multiple floors. Perfect for growing companies.
IndexPage.officeAnalyticsDescription: Want to save costs on office space? Our analytic tools will help you do just that.
IndexPage.floorPlanningDescription: Assign desks to your floors and create outstanding floor maps.
IndexPage.openSourceDescription: Self-host our software and customize it to your needs. We are open-source!
